WorkItem.Description:
Hi.
 
Any chance you could make the "Open Character File" dialog remember the path last used in the current session, like the "Save to Character file" dialog already does?
 
Thanks,
G.
WorkItem.Summary: Open Character File doesn't remember last used path

Comments.Message: I'm unable to reproduce this, from what I can tell it already behaves this way. Can you tell us what version/browser/os you're using?
